JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: ventilations montør til jylland & sjælland/Ventilation fitter for Jutland and Zealand
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Ventilation fitter for Jutland and Zealand

Are you a skilled and independent ventilation fitter looking for new opportunities? Then this could be something for you.

We are currently looking for experienced and quality-conscious ventilation fitters for projects in Zealand and Jutland.

About the job

We are looking for a person with experience in installing ventilation systems in buildings and apartments. You are ambitious, passionate about your work and speak Danish or English at a good level. We need a ventilation fitter as soon as possible.

We offer

A good working environment in a reputable ventilation company

The opportunity to gain valuable experience and develop both personal and professional skills

Salary according to qualifications

37-46 working hours per week

Holiday, pension according to collective agreement and SH money

Job Requirements:

Previous experience with ventilation work

Committed and responsible

Speaks Danish or good English

Reliable and hardworking

How to apply

Do you match the requirements and do you have the necessary qualifications and experience to handle the job? Do not hesitate to send your application and CV to one of our consultants.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us or check this link: https://jtworks.vincere.io/careers/job/33743/ventilations-mont%C3%B8r

Danish/English/German Consultant
Jesper
Email: jcm@jtworks.dk
Telephone: +45 61 37 48 01
Phone: +49 151 2057 4353 WhatsApp
Danish/English Consultant
Michael
Email: mda@jtworks.dk
Telephone: +45 22 20 27 89
Danish/Romanian Consultant
Florina
Email: fet@jtworks.dk
Telephone: +45 53 77 48 02
We look forward to hearing from you!
